author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
As requested in [this CMSTalk post](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/update-of-the-2023-l1-menu-tag-l1menu-collisions2023-v1-2-0/25410), this PR updates the L1T menu tag to `L1Menu_Collisions2023_v1_2_0_xml` which is compatible with the 2023 HLT menu `v1.2`.

*Important Note:*
In this PR the update is done only for 2024 MC, run4 MC and 2023 ideal MC GTs, as well as for the data `_relval` GTs, while the 2023 realistic GTs are updated (together with several other conditions) in #41947. The 2023 HI GT updated is left for a later moment.

**GT Differences:** 
- **run3_hlt:** https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_dataRun3_HLT_frozen_v2/130X_dataRun3_HLT_frozen_v3
   - Difference wrt production GT: https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_dataRun3_HLT_v2/130X_dataRun3_HLT_frozen_v3
- **run3_data_express:**  https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_dataRun3_Express_frozen_v2/130X_dataRun3_Express_frozen_v3
   - Difference wrt production GT: https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_dataRun3_Express_v3/130X_dataRun3_Express_frozen_v3
- **run3_data_prompt:**  https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_dataRun3_Prompt_frozen_v2/130X_dataRun3_Prompt_frozen_v3
   - Difference wrt production GT: https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_dataRun3_Prompt_v4/130X_dataRun3_Prompt_frozen_v3
- **phase1_2023_design:** https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/131X_mcRun3_2023_design_v5/131X_mcRun3_2023_design_v6
- **phase1_2023_cosmics_design:** https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/131X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_design_deco_v5/131X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_design_deco_v6
- **phase1_2024_realistic:** https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/131X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v3/131X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v4
- **phase2_realistic:** https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/131X_mcRun4_realistic_v5/131X_mcRun4_realistic_v6

#### PR validation:
Tested with:
```
runTheMatrix.py -l 138.4,138.5,139.001,12834.0,23234.0 -j 8 --ibeos
```

#### Backport:
Not a backport, backport to 13_1_X and 13_0_X will be opened soon
title: Add new L1T menu to relval/ideal/2024/run4 GTs and re-snapshot data GTS
